title: Reflexive Pronouns
content: I hurt [myself|me]. He taught [himself|him] to play guitar.
explanationEnUs: Use reflexive pronouns (myself, himself) when the subject and object are the same person.
explanationZhTw: 當主詞和受詞是同一人時，使用反身代名詞 (myself, himself)。
explanationZhCn: 当主语和宾语是同一人时，使用反身代词 (myself, himself)。

title: Reflexive for Emphasis
content: She fixed the car [herself|her]. I spoke to the boss [myself|me].
explanationEnUs: Reflexive pronouns can be used to emphasize that someone did something alone.
explanationZhTw: 反身代名詞可用於強調某人獨自完成了某事。
explanationZhCn: 反身代词可用于强调某人独自完成了某事。

title: Indefinite Pronouns
explanationEnUs: Indefinite pronouns like 'everyone', 'anyone', 'something' are treated as singular nouns.
explanationZhTw: 像 'everyone', 'anyone', 'something' 這樣的不定代名詞被視為單數名詞。
explanationZhCn: 像 'everyone', 'anyone', 'something' 这样的不定代词被视为单数名词。

title: Reciprocal Pronouns
content: They love [each other|themselves]. We help [one another|ourselves].
explanationEnUs: Use 'each other' or 'one another' when action is two-way.
explanationZhTw: 當動作是雙向時，使用 'each other' 或 'one another'。
explanationZhCn: 当动作是双向时，使用 'each other' or 'one another'。

title: Demonstrative Pronouns
content: [This|These] is my book. [Those|That] are my friends.
explanationEnUs: This/That for singular. These/Those for plural.
explanationZhTw: This/That 用於單數。These/Those 用於複數。
explanationZhCn: This/That 用于单数。These/Those 用于复数。
